implementation_guide.description: Comprehensive guide with formulas, filtered view specs, HTML widgets, and CSS

html_dashboard.description: Interactive standalone dashboard with Beautiful-First design system, progress rings, funnel visualization

quick_start_guide.description: Step-by-step instructions for Ana and support staff to implement filtered views, formulas, and publishing

nextAction.task: Implement Dashboard_V2 in actual V7 Google Sheet
instructions: Open V7 in Google Sheets (not the Excel file)
Follow Google-Sheets-Quick-Start.md Part 1 to add formulas
Test that formulas update when data changes
Create at least 2 filtered views (Ana Pipeline View, Film Status View)
Embed in docs site using HTML widgets from implementation guide

phase1_ready.dashboard_formulas: 24 copy-paste formulas ready (COUNTIF, COUNTIFS, COUNTA, SUM)
phase1_ready.filtered_views: 5 view specifications with filter conditions and sort orders
phase1_ready.named_ranges: 4 ranges defined for publishing (pipeline_summary, film_status_2026, host_pipeline, action_items)
phase1_ready.conditional_formatting: Yellow highlight rule for action items > 0

phase2_ready.html_widgets: 4 embeddable widgets with Beautiful-First design (Pipeline Status, Film Intake, Action Badge, Full Host Tracker)
phase2_ready.standalone_dashboard: Full interactive HTML dashboard with progress rings, funnel, real-time updates
phase2_ready.css_components: Google-embed, resource-card, action-badge classes ready to add to docs site
phase2_ready.auto_refresh: JavaScript configured for 5-minute auto-refresh (when published URLs configured)

technicalNotes.design_system: Beautiful-First (Fraunces display, Source Sans 3 body, warm amber palette)
formula_types_used: COUNTIF - count cells matching text criteria
technicalNotes.publishing_method: Google Sheets Publish to Web (named ranges as iframe embeds)
technicalNotes.update_frequency: Auto-refresh every 5 minutes (Google Sheets published ranges)
technicalNotes.accessibility: WCAG 2.1 compliant - color never sole signal, text labels on all metrics

decisions.decision: Google Sheets as primary visualization layer
decisions.rationale: Low-code, OEFF already uses Google Workspace, publish-to-web is built-in

decisions.decision: Static docs site preserved (no build step added)
decisions.rationale: Current Cloudflare Pages deploy is zero-config

decisions.decision: No migration needed â€” V7 already in Google Sheets
decisions.rationale: Eliminates migration risk; jump straight to views and dashboard work

decisions.decision: Beautiful-First design system for HTML dashboard
decisions.rationale: Matches existing OEFF brand, warm/accessible, validated patterns (progress rings not bars)

decisions.decision: Both implementation guide + quick start guide
decisions.rationale: Implementation guide for Garen (technical), Quick Start for Ana/support (non-technical)

potential_risks: V7 sheet names may not match exactly (case-sensitive) - formulas will return #REF!
Publishing permissions may need adjustment if sheet isn't shared with 'Anyone with link'
Iframe embeds may be blocked by Content Security Policy (CSP) on docs site - test first
Team may need training on creating/using filtered views - Quick Start guide addresses this

complete: Filtered view specifications for 5 user roles (Ana, Support, Films, Hosts, Participants)
Named range definitions for 4 publishable data subsets
4 HTML widgets for docs site embedding (Pipeline, Films, Action Items, Full Tracker)
Standalone interactive HTML dashboard with progress rings and funnel visualization
CSS components for docs site integration
Step-by-step Quick Start guide for non-technical users
pending: Actually creating Dashboard_V2 in live Google Sheet (requires access to V7 in Google Sheets)

Publishing named ranges and obtaining URLs
Embedding widgets in actual docs site HTML
User acceptance testing with Ana and support staff

source_data: V7 Google Sheet - Live canonical data source (URL needed)
